bosk.block.zoo.multi_grained_scanning.base#

Module Contents#

Classes#

MultiGrainedScanningBlock

Base Multi Grained Scanning Block.
class bosk.block.zoo.multi_grained_scanning.base.MultiGrainedScanningBlock(models, window_size, stride, shape_sample=None)#

Bases: abc.ABC

Base Multi Grained Scanning Block.

It takes X of shape (n_samples, n_channels) as an input and returns the tensor of shape (n_samples, n_out_channels).

Parameters:

  • models (Tuple[Any, Any]) – Tuple of underlying models.

  • window_size (int) – Size of the sliding window.

  • stride (int) – Stride of the sliding window.

  • shape_sample (Optional[Tuple[int, Ellipsis]]) – Input data spatial dimensions (shape).

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

  • X: Data tensor of shape (n_samples, n_channels).

  • y: Target variable values of shape (n_samples, [n_outputs]).

Transform inputs#

  • X: Data tensor of shape (n_samples, n_channels).

Output slots#

  • output: Prediction tensor of shape (n_samples, n_out_channels).

fit(X, y)#
Return type:

MultiGrainedScanningBlock

_window_slicing_fit(X, y)#
Return type:

None

abstract _window_slicing_data(X, y=None)#
Return type:

Tuple[np.ndarray, Optional[np.ndarray]]

Return type:

Return type:

bosk.data.CPUData
